entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High plus 4. Forecast issued 07:45 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 07:45 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 07:45 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
